verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> me an <S%H8641>offering:<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that gives it <S%H5068>willingly<s%> with his <S%H3820>heart<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H8641>offering.<s%>
And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8641>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of them; <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5178>brass,<s%>
And <S%H8504>blue,<s%> and <S%H713>purple,<s%> and <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair,
And <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red,<s%> and <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%>
<S%H8081>Oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light,<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%> for <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and for <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
<S%H7718>Onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%> in the <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and in the <S%H2833>breastplate.<s%>
And let them <S%H6213>make<s%> me a <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> that I may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

According to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H7200>show<s%> you, after the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> thereof, even <S%H3651>so<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

And they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof.

And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> and <S%H2351>without<s%> shall you <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it, and shall <S%H6213>make<s%> on it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And you shall <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for it, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>corners<s%> thereof; and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shall be in the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it.
And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And you shall <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> by the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> may be <S%H5375>borne<s%> with them.
The <S%H905>staves<s%> shall be in the <S%H2885>rings<s%> of the <S%H727>ark:<s%> they shall not be <S%H5493>taken<s%> from it.
And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> of <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> them, in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat.

And <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H7098>end,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H7098>end:<s%> even of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> thereof.

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> shall <S%H6566>stretch<s%> forth their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high,<s%> <S%H5526>covering<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat with their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall look one to <S%H251>another;<s%> toward the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat shall the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> be.

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat <S%H4605>above<s%> on the <S%H727>ark;<s%> and in the <S%H727>ark<s%> you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> that I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you.

And there I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you, and I will <S%H1696>commune<s%> with you from <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat, from <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things <S%H834>which<s%> I will give you in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof.
And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> thereto a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> to it a <S%H4526>border<s%> of an <S%H2948>hand<s%> <S%H2948>breadth<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2213>crown<s%> to the <S%H4526>border<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that are <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereof.
<S%H5980>Over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H4526>border<s%> shall the <S%H2885>rings<s%> be for <S%H1004>places<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> that the <S%H7979>table<s%> may be <S%H5375>borne<s%> with them.

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7086>dishes<s%> thereof, and <S%H3709>spoons<s%> thereof, and <S%H7184>covers<s%> thereof, and <S%H4518>bowls<s%> thereof, to <S%H5258>cover<s%> <S%H2004>with:<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> them.
And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> on the <S%H7979>table<s%> show <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H8548>always.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> of <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> shall the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> be <S%H6213>made:<s%> his <S%H3409>shaft,<s%> and his <S%H7070>branches,<s%> his <S%H1375>bowls,<s%> his <S%H3730>knops,<s%> and his <S%H6525>flowers,<s%> shall be of the same.

And <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H6654>sides<s%> of it; <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side:<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like to <S%H8246>almonds,<s%> with a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch;<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like <S%H8246>almonds<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> with a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> in the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> that <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>
And in the <S%H4501>candlesticks<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> made like to <S%H8246>almonds,<s%> with their <S%H3730>knops<s%> and their <S%H6525>flowers.<s%>

And there shall be a <S%H3730>bud<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the same, and a <S%H3730>bud<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the same, and a <S%H3730>bud<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the same, according to the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> that <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of the <S%H4501>candlestick.<s%>

Their <S%H3730>knops<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> shall be of the same: <S%H3605>all<s%> it shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4749>beaten<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof: and they shall <S%H5927>light<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof, that they may give <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H5676>against<s%> <S%H6440><s%> it.
And the <S%H4457>tongs<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4289>firepans<s%> thereof, shall be of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall he <S%H6213>make<s%> it, with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3627>vessels.<s%>
And <S%H7200>look<s%> that you <S%H6213>make<s%> them after their <S%H8403>pattern,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H7200>showed<s%> you in the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>
